-1.title: Outlaws 2
-1.plot: truTV is always tough on crime - so we've rounded up another twenty of the stupidest criminals ever to break the law.? On the docket:? a nearly-naked burglar, a break-in artist who can't break out, a robber with a pre-historic weapon, a ridiculously elaborate plot to steal sheep, and lots more.? Sitting in judgment of these idiots will be Chelsea Peretti, Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges, Frank Stallone, and other law-abiding celebs.

1.title: Criminals
1.plot: World's Dumbest presents 20 of the most clueless bad guys in the criminal world. Sit down and join our cast of celebrities and experts as they comment on the all star performances of Dumb Criminals caught on tape. See criminals stuck in a ventilation shafts, robbing banks in disguise, falling through the ceilings, stealing underwear, and much, much more. Celebrities who've had their own brushes with the law including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding and Todd Bridges team up with law enforcement experts and comedians to provide hilarious commentary to the ...

5.title: Drivers
5.plot: World's Dumbest Drivers captures moronic moments from across the globe as we countdown 20 of the best displays of dumb driving. Sit down and join our cast of celebrities including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges, and Helio Castroneves as they comment on disasters behind the wheel, all caught on tape.

7.title: Daredevils
7.plot: World's Dumbest Daredevils features the thrills, the chills, and, especially, the SPILLS that some of the most whacked-out, would-be daredevils have thoughtfully captured on tape for the delight of our viewing audience. Featuring vengeful crocodiles, uncooperative snowmobiles, hyperactive ATV's, British cheese-rollers, Flaming Tar Barrels (must be seen to be believed), Mascots Gone Wild, French Paragliders? blown into New Jersey, death-defying (barely) bridge jumpers, and a whole lot more. All the moments are commented on by our celebrity cast of daring and outrageous...

9.title: Partiers
9.plot: World's Dumbest Partiers (hiccup) is a show about the hootched-up shenanigans that the over-served get themselves into, frequently in front of a surveillance or dash cam. Featuring Drunk Tank Strippers, a DUI Bridezilla (in her wedding dress, no less), a drunken bear, a naked horse race, a guy who can't remember the ABC's, and a drunken Captain America with a burrito in his pants, the clips defy logic, sensibility, and sobriety. Helpfully, we have our celebrity cast along to help decipher the drunken antics. People like Leif Garrett, Danny Bonaduce, and Todd Bridges ...

11.title: Drivers 3
11.plot: World's Dumbest Drivers captures moronic moments from across the globe as we countdown 20 of the best displays of dumb driving.? Sit down and join our cast of celebrities including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges, and Helio Castroneves as they comment on disasters behind the wheel, all caught on tape.?

12.title: Daredevils 2
12.plot: Do not try this at home. Instead, sit back, relax and watch as 20 dimwitted thrill seekers harm themselves in all sorts of creative ways on World's Dumbest Daredevils 2. Featuring a dung diving sports fan, a downhill couch race, kayaking off a cliff, dirt skiing, man versus marlin (the marlin wins), woman versus killer whale (the whale wins), Richard Branson's bum-scarring leap off the Palms Casino in Vegas and the longest ski wipeout you will ever see (it's still going on). If there's a dumb way to hurt yourself, these daredevils have tried it. With play by play ...

13.title: Competitions
13.plot: World's Dumbest Competitions counts down the 20 craziest (and most pointless) contests known to man. You'll see donkey racing, people running across the tops of outhouses while being pelted with beer cans, tuna tossing, toe wrestling, creative facial hair growing, poker playing in the middle of a bull ring (stressful), shin kicking (it hurts), a backwards marathon, and Russian roulette using eggs as bullets. The competitors in these contests will do anything (ANYTHING) to win or lose at anything (ANYTHING). Get into the competitive spirit and try to beat our celebrity...

14.title: Competitions 2
14.plot: The dumb just keep giving and giving. We're back with 20 more of the dumbest criminals caught on tape.

15.title: Criminals 7
15.plot: We've searched high and low to find 20 more of the most pointless contests in the world; including sex doll river rafting, pulling cars with penises (men only), a captivating beauty pageant for female prisoners, a high stakes game of "rocks, paper, scissors", and sumo wrestlers trying to make babies cry (it's not hard). And let's not forget The World Championships of Mosquito Killing (many mosquitoes were harmed during this making of this event). The only winners in these competitions are the people who don't take part in them. Naturally all contests will be judged, ...

16.title: Criminals 8
16.plot: We've rounded up twenty more of the world's dopiest crooks -- all caught on tape for your viewing pleasure.

17.title: Fans
17.plot: There's a fine line between fanatical and moronic and we present you with twenty dimwitted devotees who blatantly cross that line - often becoming part of the sports spectacle.

18.title: Drivers 4
18.plot: World's Dumbest Drivers captures moronic moments from across the globe as we countdown 20 more of the best displays of dumb driving.

19.title: Daredevils 3
19.plot: Beware - dumb stunts ahead! "Ain't no mountain high enough, ain't no valley low..." for our next collection of dimwitted thrill-seakers.

20.title: Competitions 3
20.plot: Winning is a relative term in our next set of outrageously dumb competitions.

21.plot:

22.title: Partiers 2
22.plot: Ever wake up after a crazy night out and think, Uh oh!,...I hope no one had a camera. Well guess what? They did, and we have the tape to prove it.

23.title: Shoppers
23.plot: They say the customer is always right but what if they're trampling a mother and child en route to a discounted fridge?

24.title: Animal Encounters
24.plot: World's Dumbest Animal Encounters is kind of a crazy wild kingdom, populated by insanely comic interactions between humans and animals...and Gary Busey.

25.title: Meltdowns
25.plot: World?s Dumbest Meltdowns is a compendium of pandemonium, a boatload of bedlam, seven pounds of crazy in a six pound sack.

26.title: Criminals 9
26.plot: Get ready for twenty more best-laid criminal plans gone miserably wrong!? Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of the celebrity cast tear into floundering felons in World's Dumbest Criminals #9. If you want smooth operators pulling off high-tech heists, go rent Ocean's Eleven. But if you're looking for burglaries broken up by broom-wielding biddies, then this is the show for you.

1.title: Record Breakers
1.plot: This installment of World's Dumbest Drivers is a crash course in automotive insanity. Todd Bridges, Gary Busey and a motorcade of D-list darlings poke fun at busted bikers, belligerent bus drivers and a dude who wants to put a whole lot more than two lips on a hard body.

2.title: Drivers 6
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: World's Dumbest Employees
3.plot: If you think your co-workers are slow, just wait until you see the twenty mis-guided workers on display in World's Dumbest Employees.

1.title: Criminals 10
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Drivers 7
2.plot: Prepare to see plenty of phenomenally misguided felons and misbehaving miscreants stumbling and bumbling their way onto our newest criminal countdown - World's Dumbest Criminals #10. Join Gary Busey, Danny Bonaduce and a gaggle of celebrity commentators - all unwilling to issue pardons - as they lambaste camera-friendly cat burglars and cigarette swiping swordsmen for their seemingly unending criminal stupidity.

3.title: Daredevils 4
3.plot: What do you get when you combine death-defying stunts with people completely lacking in good judgement?? World's Dumbest Daredevils 4!? Whether it's kite-surfing in a hurricane, island jumping in a speedboat, or monument scaling in Paris, nothing ends well for these super-stunt dummies. With commentary from our very own cast of celebrity that devils you wouldn't dare cross.

4.title: Partiers 3
4.plot: You are cordially invited to witness the antics of the world's dimmest partiers. That's right, 20 outrageous instances of ridiculous revelry. Chick fights, flaming shots, and many more moments of revelry featuring people who just don't know when to say when. All this plus catty comments from Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding and the rest of the cast.

5.title: Criminals 11
5.plot: Twenty more misguided citizens...from a naughty nurse with an acute case of kleptomania to a DUI suspect who tries to beat the system by drinking office supplies. These bad guys are sure to leave a very funny taste in your mouth!? Featuring commentary from Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of our acclaimed celebrity panel.

6.title: Drivers 8
6.plot: Start your engines as World's Dumbest presents 20 of the most thrilling, entertaining and just plain dumb crashes, smashes, and vehicular blunders. If you think you've seen it all, just wait until you see these road-ragers behind the wheel! ??Featuring the high speed, turbo-charged commentary of our celebrity cast, including Todd Bridges, Leif Garrett, Danny Bonaduce, and Tonya Harding.

7.title: Competitions 4
7.plot: World's Dumbest Competitions 4:? Drinking contests, dirty dog dancing and pillow fighting are among the top-notch competitions in this week's installment....? Twenty crackpot competitors ready to stumble, bumble and tumble to immortality. Join Danny Bonaduce, Judy Gold and the rest of our celebrity cast as they pare these cut-rate challengers down to size.

8.title: Daredevils 5
8.plot: Get ready for twenty more laugh-out-loud moments - here comes another episode of World's Dumbest Daredevils! Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding and the rest of our celebrity cast lambaste stunt drivers, base jumpers and monster truckers for their dare-devil-may-care attitudes.

9.title: Criminals 12
9.plot: What do a breast pump thief, a purebred poodle-napper and amorous arsonist have in common? They're all featured on World's Dumbest Criminals. Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges and the rest our celebrity cast hold these slow-witted offenders in contempt of just plain common sense. A show so entertaining, there ought to be a law against it!!

10.title: Drivers 9
10.plot: Forget all those Driver's Ed films. There's no better example of what not to do behind the wheel than this episode of World's Dumbest Drivers. Watch as Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and a the rest of our celebrity cast play bumper cars with the cops, go on unintentional off-road expeditions and cower in fear at the most dangerous threat of all: elderly drivers.

11.title: Partiers 4
11.plot: In its continuing effort to illuminate improper behavior, World's Dumbest brings you 20 of the World's Dumbest Partiers. Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges and the rest of our celebrity cast comment on impaired dart throwers in an English pub, binge drinking buffoons in Canada and? Panamanian Carnival celebrations that are 'muy estupido'.

12.title: Performers
12.plot: Prepare yourself for performances so bad and so offensive that you will be unable to avert your eyes from the screen. Catch Karl Rove rapping, runway supermodels with serious wardrobe malfunctions, and a flea-market owner who insists his store is just like a mini-mall. Featuring commentary from Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of our top-notch celebrity panel.

13.title: Confrontations
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Criminals 13
1.plot: As part of its ongoing crime-fighting mission, World's Dumbest brings you twenty more of the dumbest lawbreakers on the planet. From arsonists who manage to torch themselves, to a burglar who locks himself into the store he's burglarizing, to a bank robber who waits in line patiently for a teller...wearing a ski mask. Featuring commentary from Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges and the rest of our top-notch celebrity panel.

2.title: Drivers 10
2.plot: As part of its efforts to keep streets safe, we bring you 20 of the World's Dumbest Drivers. You'll be rubbernecking at motorized barstool pilots, tow truck drivers fleeing police, and a DUI defense attorney who's busted for... DUI. Featuring the usual commentary and sing-song from Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding and the rest of our celebrity cast.

3.title: Partiers 5
3.plot: World's Dumbest pays tribute to toasts...and roasts - 20 of the dumbest partiers on the planet. Grandmas doing kegstands, karaoke singers unable to belt out the ABC's, and Aussies shooting fireworks from down under. Featuring commentary from Danny Baldwin, Leif Garrett, Danny Bonaduce and the other world-renowned party animals in our celebrity cast.

4.title: Daredevils 6
4.plot: The perfect recipe for another episode of the World's Dumbest Daredevils?? Two base jumpers, a ski jumper, three fiery crashes, and a wheelie gone very bad. Featuring bold and audacious commentary from Todd Bridges, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding and the rest of our celebrity panel.

5.title: Record Breakers 2
5.plot: World's Dumbest peers deep into the souls of those who dare to reach new heights, dare to consume new quantities and generally dare to do what none before them have.

6.title: Competitions 5
6.plot: Indulge the fierce competitor inside you and check out this episode of World's Dumbest!? Join Loni Love, Leif Garrett, Judy Gold and the others as they take down gravy wrestlers, coffin racers and others engaged in competitions that will leave you concerned for mankind's future and doubled over in laughter.

7.title: Criminals 14
7.plot: World's Dumbest is back with 20 criminals who are always two steps behind the law. Watch inept arsonists, butterfingered bank robbers and corrupt civil servants try and fail to beat the system. Featuring commentary from Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges and the rest of the usual celebrity suspects.

8.title: Drivers 11
8.plot: Buckle up for the ride of your life as Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin and the rest of our celebrity cast single out the dumbest wheelmen and women on the roads in World's Dumbest Drivers. In this episode, we hand out special "Dummy" nominations to drivers whose behavior will have? you reaching for the emergency break.

9.title: Partiers 6
9.plot: In its ongoing mission to illuminate improper behavior, World's Dumbest brings you 20 of the World's Dumbest Partiers. From a proud celebrant marking Canada Day by breaking beer bottles on his head, to a naked john running after the prostitute who stole all his clothes, these are the memories that will linger after the hangover has passed. With commentary from Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges, Leif Garrett and the rest of our hard-partying cast.

10.title: Daredevils 7
10.plot: Get ready to throw caution to the wind for World Dumbest Daredevils 7. From a snowboarder whose mid-air high-five sends his buddy to the hospital, to the base-jumper who becomes a tree ornament, to the self-proclaimed "King of Crash", you'll see brave young people acting very foolishly. With breathless commentary from Tonya Harding, Daniel Baldwin and the rest of our daring cast.

11.title: Record Breakers 3
11.plot: Join Todd Bridges, Tonya Harding and Danny Bonaduce as they ogle at the biggest, the smallest, the hairyest, the heaviest and more. Twenty brave souls attempting really marginal records sure to induce side-splitting laughter.

12.title: Criminals 15
12.plot: Crime never pays... Unless you're Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding and the rest of the celebrity cast as they earn their keep lampooning the world's dumbest criminals. Targets include department store peeping toms, art thieves and a man with a profound respect for property rights.

13.title: Drivers 12
13.plot: Presented for your rubbernecking pleasure, twenty of the dumbest, and least attentive, drivers on the road. From a man at a gas pump who doesn't notice his car rolling away right behind him, to a bus driver who's so busy texting he rear-ends the car right in front of him. And we'll always have a soft spot for the bride and groom sent to jail for DUI on their wedding night. With celebrity driving instructors Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, and Todd Bridges.

1.title: Criminals 16
1.plot: Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Tonya Harding are back and doing what they do best: shaming dumb criminals into cleaning up their acts. Watch as they their aim their barbs at bikini clad burglars, a preadolescent carjacker and a lotto ticket thief whose luck runs out mid heist. Plus, a few clips so criminally explicit we could only show them...after dark.

2.title: Drivers 13
2.plot: Warning: clips in this show are dumber than they appear! Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin and the rest of our celebrity cast poke fun at some seriously slow drivers. Get ready for nitro-burning school buses, recreation vehicles used for purposes other than fun and a prominent baseball player who puts up big numbers on the breathalyzer.

3.title: Performers 2
3.plot: Get ready for performances so awful you won't be able to avert your eyes from your television screen.A twenty-ring circus featuring a fire-eater who lights his own face, a sports mascot who neuters himself on a fence, and a chesty woman whose entire act consists of crushing melons, beer cans and bricks with her breasts. Plus an answer to the age-old question: "When a rocker stage-dives and there's no-one there to catch him, does it make a sound?"? Featuring the always flawless commentary of Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of our celebrity cast.

4.title: Daredevils 8
4.plot: World's Dumbest strives to make the planet safer by exposing the idiotic antics of the world's dumbest daredevils.Featuring twenty dangerous stunts you won't want to try at home, including a man trying to hang-glide while being towed by a snowmobile and a motorcyclist standing up on his seat, eating a sandwich, as he rolls down the road. Not to mention the inline skater who breaks one arm, then gets back on his skates the very next day to attempt a stupid stunt that breaks the other arm. Featuring commentary from the always safety-conscious Tonya Harding, Danny ...

6.title: Criminals 17
6.plot: World's Dumbest presents another in-depth look at the criminally dumb.?Todd Bridges, Tonya Harding, Leif Garrett and the rest of our law-abiding celebrity cast conduct citizen's arrests of 20 hare-brained offenders, from a shoplifter stealing a skunk, to a man cashing checks payable to his deceased mother, to thieves trying to blow up an ATM.

7.title: Drivers 14
7.plot: World's Dumbest presents 20 excellent reasons to get off the road.? Stay home and watch Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett and the rest of our celebrity cast celebrate the World's Dumbest Drivers.? Marvel at the man who drives his car through the front door and down the hallways of city hall, the moped driver too drunk to order takeout, and the guy who takes a $100,000 sports car on a test drive...and totals it.

8.title: Holidays
8.plot: Get into the spirit with Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding and the rest of our cast as they celebrate the World's Dumbest Holidays.

9.title: Record Breakers 4
9.plot: An episode of World's Dumbest sure to go into the history books!? Twenty determined souls willing to do whatever it takes to become the best at completely pointless pursuits. Watch Aussies smash watermelons with their heads, Turks squirt milk from their eyes and Kenny G. makes hundreds cover their ears.

11.title: Criminals 18
11.plot: Join Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, and the rest of our top-notch celebrity sleuths as they track down the stupidest lawbreakers on the planet.? You'll see 20 hare-brained criminals, each one dumber than the last.? There's the meth addict who licks fallen drugs up off the floor of a police station, the bowlegged shoplifter waddling out of a convenience store with a case of beer between her legs, and the dumb criminal whose escape from his getaway car is foiled by his own seatbelt.? It all adds up an hour of television so entertaining, there ought to be a law against ...

12.title: Brawlers
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Tourists
13.plot: World's Dumbest has searched all over the planet to find the 20 dumbest tourists in the world. Join Daniel Baldwin, Todd Bridges and the rest of our globe-trotting cast as they give helpful hints to their fellow travelers. You'll meet a woman on safari who makes out with a giraffe, an impatient air traveler who crawls into an X-ray machine to avoid the line for the metal detector, and an overweight tourist at a dude ranch who mistakenly believes a tiny pony can support her weight. It all adds up to an hour-long flight of fancy that's sure to leave you in stitches.

14.title: Drivers 15
14.plot: In its continuing effort to keep our streets safe, World's Dumbest exposes 20 of the dumbest drivers in the world.? There's the jeep driver whose off-roading misadventure sends him tumbling down the side of a cliff, the amateur storm chasers who race into the center of a dangerous hailstorm, and the 14-year-old who takes his parents' car out for a spin, then crashes it.? Ride along with Todd Bridges, Leif Garrett and the rest of our celebrity commentators as they administer their own roadside sobriety and intelligence tests.

1.title: Criminals 19
1.plot: Who knows what evil lurks in the hearts of men? World's Dumbest knows! Join Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges and Tonya Harding and the rest of the celebrity cast as they lampoon the World's Dumbest Criminals. Joy ride with meth heads, play hot potato with a homemade hand grenade and catch a politician in the act of stealing an election - all on this edition of World's Dumbest!

2.title: Drivers 16
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Lovers
3.plot: Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin, and the rest of our celebrity cast turn on their own as World's Dumbest presents another installment of the World's Dumbest Performers! Get ready for Russian pop stars literally fighting for airtime, kangaroos throwing blows on a kids' TV show, and a pole that just won't stay erect at an erotic dancing competition. Guaranteed to leave you shouting, "encore!"

4.title: Daredevils 9
4.plot: As part of its ongoing mission to ensure public safety,World's Dumbest exposes the dangerous antics of the world's dumbest daredevils. You'll see a bungee jump gone terribly wrong, a rodeo where amateurs pay for the privilege of being chased by an angry bull, and a race car driver who loses a wheelie competition - but wins a $7,000 prize for having the most violent crash. Featuring the commentary of Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, Daniel Baldwin, and the rest of our safety-conscious celebrity panel.

7.title: Brawlers 2
7.plot: Get ready to rumble with Todd Bridges, Tonya Harding and the rest of our celebrity cast as they take down the World's Dumbest Brawlers. You'll have a ring side seat as a famous Hollywood director tangles with a paparazzi, bridesmaids battle for a bouquet, and MMA fighters knock each other out -- simultaneously. It all adds up to an hour of television that will have you laughing so hard, you won't be able to cry "uncle".

8.title: Partiers 9
8.plot: Join Leif Garrett, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of our hard-partying cast as World's Dumbest brings you 20 of the World's Dumbest Partiers. All your favorite party animals are here, including college students who chug their beers then snowboard downstairs, a man so drunk and lazy he pees in his own bed, then climbs in and goes to sleep, and two Russian families who get into a massive fight at the wedding reception uniting their two clans.

9.title: Criminals 20
9.plot: Todd Bridges, Leif Garrett, Daniel Baldwin and the rest of the gang are back and ready for their next assignment: busting on the dumbest criminals you've ever seen. Watch as they set their targets on designer dognappers, a fraudster who juices his insurance company and a recidivist seagull with a rap sheet longer than its wingspan.

11.title: Drivers 17
11.plot: Join Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding and Todd Bridges as they flag down some truly bad drivers. Laugh along as the World's Dumbest celebrity cast pokes big fun at soda truck thieves, runaway covered wagon drivers and an RV wheelman named "Pug."

12.title: Heroes
12.plot: World's Dumbest presents a salute to men and women in uniform who keep us safe from harm and otherwise earn our unwavering respect.

1.title: Criminals 21
1.plot: Warning, clips in this episode are even dumber than they appear!? Todd Bridges, Judy Gold, Loni Love and the rest of our celebrity cast administer their own sobriety and intelligence to the worst drivers on the planet.

2.title: Drivers 18
2.plot: Stay home and watch Daniel Baldwin, Tonya Harding and the rest of our celebrity cast as they celebrate the dumbest drivers on the planet. You'll see an angry girlfriend who tries to run over her beau, a motorcyclist who crashes seconds into his first lesson, and an SUV driver who tries to double park - on top of another car!

9.title: Tourists 2
9.plot: Join Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin and the rest of our globe-trotting celebrity cast as they seek out the 20 dumbest tourists on the planet. The many fascinating sights include a foreigner whose obnoxious demands for service in a bar in Thailand get him knocked out cold, and a vacationing scuba diver who manages to feed his own thumb to a Moray eel. Cancel your travel plans and tune in!

11.title: World's Dumbest Drivers 19
11.plot: World's Dumbest has 20 great reasons to keep off the highways.?? Gasp at the motorcycle racer who drives over a cameraman seconds into a race.

12.title: Partiers 11
12.plot: Join the celebration as The Smoking Gun Presents counts down the 20 dumbest partiers in the world... Everyone from the music festival attendee who's so impaired he can barely put on a pair of flip flops, to the woman who can't shake her booty, despite extensive coaching. And, of course, there's the circus performer who likes to hoist a few beers - 24 of them, to be exact - from rings going through his testicles. With commentary from Danny Bonaduce, Tonya Harding, and the rest of our hard-partying cast.

5.title: World's Dumbest Criminals 23
5.plot: World's Dumbest presents another in-depth look at the criminally dumb.

6.title: World's Dumbest Daredevils 12
6.plot: As part of its ongoing mission to ensure public safety, World's Dumbest exposes the idiocy of the world's dumbest daredevils.

7.title: World's Dumbest Brawlers 5
7.plot: Get ready to rumble as Daniel Baldwin, Leif Garrett, Danny Bonaduce and the rest of our street-fighting cast takes on the dumbest brawlers on the planet.

2.title: Drivers 22
2.plot: truTV presents twenty of the biggest idiots ever to be seen on stage or screen -- including a TV pitchman doing stunningly bad impressions, a pageant contestant who can't stay on her feet, a newscaster who can't keep a straight face, and a fake power ranger getting a non-fake injury. It's presented by our always-brilliant celebrity cast, including Tonya Harding, Frank Stallone, Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin and Danny Bonaduce.

3.title: World's Dumbest Thrillseekers
3.plot: Want to see morons pursue thrills and rack up hospital bills? Well it's a good thing you came to truTV. In this hour-long episode of World's Dumbest, you'll meet a human fly who swats himself, a guy who gets crunched on his own home-made water slide, skiers with bad ideas, bikers with worse ideas, and a very nasty nurse to make the wounds worse. It's all presented with sensitive commentary from sympathetic observers like Daniel Baldwin, Leif Garrett and Chelsea Peretti.

12.title: World's Dumbest Hillbillies
12.plot: Most country folk are practical, sensible, and intelligent. But we've searched the hills and valleys to find 20 who are just the opposite.? Check out a dangerous redneck roller coaster, a lumberjack with horrible aim, a plastered political commentator, and a super-hero whose only power is jumping into a pile of beer cans.?? Here to monitor these morons is our celebrity cast, including Judy Gold, Daniel Baldwin, Tonya Harding and Todd Bridges.

8.title: World's Dumbest Lovers 3
8.plot: We've all done stupid things for love -- but not this stupid.

6.title: Episode #12.6
6.plot: Things get physical tonight on TruTV as we give you the blow by blow on 20 of the most foolish fisticuffs in recent memory. This week we've got a throw down on the subway, a man having it out with his dryer, a llama that doesn't take kindly to strangers, a scenic stick battle in France and a slap-fight that quickly becomes a fight-fight. We top it off punch drunk pontifications from the likes of Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges and Daniel Baldwin.

8.title: Episode #12.8
8.plot: Beware - you're about to get played by the stupidest practical jokers on the planet. We've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranks, including a remote-controlled ejector-couch, an evil clown on wheels, and a chocolate diaper surprise. Featuring commentary from our cast of celebrity smart-asses, including Todd Bridges, Daniel Baldwin, Tonya Harding and Danny Bonaduce.

9.title: Episode #12.9
9.plot: When idiots party, chaos ensues. TruTV's got 20 stellar examples of stupid celebrations, complete with fireworks in the bathtub, a drunk diving off an escalator, and dinner for one on the subway floor. And who better to host this party our smart-aleck celebrity cast, including Tonya Harding, Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges and Frank Stallone.

10.title: Episode #12.10
10.plot:

11.title: Outlaws 5
11.plot: If you're looking for brilliant criminal minds, look elsewhere. But if you want seriously stupid crooks, we've rounded up 20, slapped on the cuffs, and put them on TV for you to laugh at -- burglars in their underwear, jewel thieves who don't know diamonds from plastic, and robbers with seriously lame disguises. It's all served up by our law-abiding celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Daniel Baldwin, Tonya Harding, and Todd Bridges.

12.title: Episode #12.12
12.plot: We've combed the back-country to find farming fools and small-town morons - the world's dumbest Hillbillies. Say howdy to twenty of them, including lawnmower racers, do-it-yourself dentists. Flesh will fly during an amateur tattoo removal. And we've got country-flavored commentary from our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Judy Gold and Danny Bonaduce.

13.title: Episode #12.13
13.plot: TruTV's got your party right here, filled with 20 of the stupidest people ever to celebrate on camera.

14.title: Episode #12.14

15.title: Episode #12.15
15.plot: If you want to star in this show, all you need is a vehicle and a stunted brain. We've got 20 of the world's most moronic motorheads on display, crashing everything from golf carts to Segways to snowmobiles to Ferraris. In our drivers' seat: Todd Bridges, Tonya Harding, Daniel Baldwin, Frank Stallone, and the rest of our celebrity cast.

16.title: Episode #12.16
16.plot: TruTV's got startling video of 20 daredevils, bashing themselves silly in pursuit of that ever-elusive adrenaline rush. Each is dumber than the last, including a hung-over hang-glider, several BMX klutzes, and a naked motorcycle stunt guy who gets road rash in the worst possible place. Plus we've got commentary from our usual crew of celebrity thrill-seekers, including Tonya Harding, Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and Daniel Baldwin.

17.title: Episode #12.17
17.plot: Twenty idiots enter the ring, but only one will triumph! TruTV counts down the dumbest fights ever captured on video - from Russian billionaires getting physical on a talk show, to subway brawls from many nations, to one of our own cast members who loves to fight dirty. And of course we've got blow-by-blow commentary from celebrity sluggers like Tonya Harding, Danny Bonaduce, Todd Bridges and Frank Stallone.

19.title: Episode #12.19
19.plot: Take a vehicle, add an idiot, and the roads get chaotic and crazy. We've got 20 real-life video clips of dopes driving dangerously for your amusement -- including a thief in a hijacked back-hoe, a trucker using Flintstone-style technology, and an Amish buggy driver who couldn't care less about the rules of the road. Along for the ride: our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Todd Bridges, Danny Bonaduce and Tonya Harding.

4.title: World's Dumbest Outlaws 6
4.plot: Tru TV is throwing the book at 20 of the stupidest citizens ever to run afoul of the law.

5.title: World's Dumbest Performers 11
5.plot: Brilliant performers are rare and exquisite.

1.title: World's Dumbest Motorheads 7
1.plot: The 14th season of truTV's hit series revs up with 20 motorheads, putting the pedal to the metal of dumb. You'll see a tipsy Mayor earn a DUI, some severe Australian road rage and a snowmobile avalanche.

2.title: Brawlers 13
2.plot: Some things are worth fighting for. Your home, your family, your right to party. But we'd rather show you 20 of the wildest, most pointless brawls ever captured on film.

3.title: Thrillseekers 7
3.plot: What's more thrilling than being a daredevil? Watching 20 idiots crash and burn.

4.title: Inventions 8
4.plot: truTV is counting down 20 of the most brilliant must-have products ever made. Max out your credit card on inventions that bling out your teeth, streamline your drinking, turn your dog into a walking purse, and make putting on clothes more like spray tanning. And who better to give their own trustworthy consumer reports than our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Danny Bonaduce , Tonya Harding, and Todd Bridges.

5.title: Themeless 1
5.plot: truTV is mixing it up with a potpourri of 20 of the dumbest people on the planet. Our countdown includes a partier who can't keep her pants on, daredevils unable to stay upright, a magician who fails to keep his assistant afloat, and vegetables that tell the future.

7.title: Outlaws 8
7.plot: What ya gonna do when they come for you? If you're anything like the 20 supremely stupid criminals in our countdown, something really dumb! We've got a robber taken down by some kindly hobos, an irate smoker who tries to get revenge with a chainsaw, and some super sexy baristas providing a little extra sugar on the sly. Plus, find out why you should never answer a call from Joan Mayo, if you can help it. With commentary from our law abiding cast, including Todd Bridges, Tonya Harding, Daniel Baldwin and Leif Garrett.

8.title: Performers 13
8.plot: Take your seats and prepare to be amazed! TruTV is counting down 20 of the dumbest performers you've ever seen.

9.title: World's Dumbest Partiers 20
9.plot: Crank it up! TruTV throwing down with 20 of the dumbest partiers we could find. Our countdown includes a baseball game streaker, a drunk falling up a hill and a wedding dance you have to see to believe.

10.title: World's Dumbest Hillbillies 5
10.plot: Hitch up the trailer and get out the good moonshine, because TruTV is counting down the 20 most blockheaded bumpkins ever caught on tape.

12.title: Themeless 2
12.plot: Reach in! TruTv's got a grab bag filled with 20 of the dumbest people on the planet. You'll see a man tickled unconscious, a skydiving granny who's dangerously unprepared, Seuss-inspired modeling, and a surprise game of chicken with an oncoming train. Adding to the fun is our celebrity cast, including Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges, and Gary Busey.

13.title: Brawlers 14
13.plot: It's time to get in the cage with 20 of the most boneheaded brawlers ever to throw down.

3.title: Motorheads 8
3.plot: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. There's a backwards biker, a superhero stopped for speeding and an extreme case of Russian road rage.

4.title: World's Dumbest Thrillseekers 9
4.plot: Feel the adrenaline rush with 20 of the dumbest daredevils ever caught on film. We've got base jumpers, bull riders, tightrope walkers, even an alligator wrangler.

5.title: World's Dumbest Outlaws 9
5.plot: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing.

6.title: World's Dumbest Motorheads 9
6.plot: Knuckleheads, start your engines! TruTV is hitting the road with 20 of the dumbest motorheads ever to ignore traffic laws. You'll see a passed out pilot, road rage rants, a nearly-too-hot-for-TV motorcycle ride, and a mail truck that delivers a hit.

7.title: Performers 15
7.plot: The curtain goes up and IQs go down as truTV brings you 20 of the dumbest performers ever to grace the stage. You'll see a Nutella-covered artist, the longest (and worst) death scene in film history, and a Japanese game show you have to see to believe.

8.title: Partiers 21
8.plot: Join the festivities with 20 of the most pinheaded partiers ever to make the scene. From wild bachelorettes to a drunk Santa and more than you ever wanted to know about butt chugging. With crazy commentary from Danny Bonaduce and our celebrity cast, plus hot comics like Billy Kimball and Brendon Walsh.

9.title: Thrillseekers 10
9.plot: Brace for impact - 20 of the world's dumbest adrenaline junkies are about to hit your screen! We've got a wannabe astronaut taking one giant leap off a roof, a girl who plays chicken with a bull, and a hot-air balloon wedding that hits the ground screaming. With spine-tingling commentary from our hilariously hardcore cast.
